OutputFileParameter.Parameters:
-c:a copy -map 0:a -c:v h264_nvenc -tune hq 
-b:v 26M -minrate 24M -fps_mode cfr -r 60 
-temporal-aq 1 -i_qfactor 0.75 -b_qfactor 1.1 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle -filter_complex "
[0:v]scale_npp=2106:-1:interp_algo=lanczos:format=yuv420p, setsar=1/1, hwdownload, 
pad=w=2560:h=1440:x=0:y=-1, hwupload_cuda, scale_npp=format=nv12[base];
[1:v]scale_npp=format=nv12[overlay_video];
[base][overlay_video]overlay_cuda=x=main_w-overlay_w:y=-1"

-c:a copy -map 0:a -c:v hevc_nvenc -preset p7 -tune hq -tier high 
-b:v 26M -minrate 24M -vsync cfr -r 60 
-temporal-aq 1 -i_qfactor 0.75 -b_qfactor 1.1 -refs:v 16 -rc-lookahead 32 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle -filter_complex "
[0:v]hwupload_cuda, scale_npp=2106:-1:interp_algo=cubic, setsar=1/1, 
hwdownload, pad=w=2560:h=1440:x=0:y=-1[base]; 
[base][1]overlay=x=main_w-overlay_w:y=main_h-overlay_h"

-c:v hevc_nvenc -preset p7 -tune hq -pix_fmt yuv444p
-b:v 80M -minrate 75M -tier main
-temporal-aq 1 -i_qfactor 0.75 -b_qfactor 1.1 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle
-colorspace smpte170m -color_primaries smpte170m -color_trc smpte170m

-c:a copy -c:v hevc_nvenc -preset p7 -tune hq -tier high 
-b:v 24M -minrate 20M -shortest -pix_fmt yuv444p 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle

{preferred_format=png}

> Specific frame
-vf select=eq(n\,10) -frames:v 1 -sws_flags full_chroma_int+accurate_rnd

> Range of frames
-vf select='between(n\,x\,y)' -start_number x -sws_flags full_chroma_int+accurate_rnd 
-vsync 0 %03d.png

> Multiple frames
-vf select=eq(n\,10)+(n\,20)+(n\,30) -sws_flags full_chroma_int+accurate_rnd -vsync 0
//add -frame_pts 1 to extract from output frames (and not input ones)

-c:v libvpx-vp9 -crf 23 -b:v 0 -deadline good -cpu-used 2 -r 60 
-vf "scale=-1:480:flags=bicubic, setsar=1/1" -pix_fmt yuv420p -pass 1
-an -f null NUL && 
ffmpeg -y -i {file1name}
-c:v libvpx-vp9 -crf 23 -b:v 0 -deadline good -cpu-used 2 -r 60
-vf "scale=-1:480:flags=bicubic, setsar=1/1" -pix_fmt yuv420p -pass 2 
-c:a libopus -b:a 172k

& cmd /V /C "set var1={file1name} && 
call echo file '%^var1:~1,-2%' > %temp%\ffmpeg_concat_list.txt"
&& cmd /V /C "set var2={file2name} && 
call echo file '%^var2:~1,-2%' >> %temp%\ffmpeg_concat_list.txt"
&& ffmpeg -y -safe 0 -f concat -i %temp%\ffmpeg_concat_list.txt -c copy {outputname}
&& del %temp%\ffmpeg_concat_list.txt

-c:a libopus -b:a 320k -shortest -pix_fmt yuv420p -r 60 
-c:v hevc_nvenc -preset lossless -tune lossless -tier high 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle

-c:a copy -shortest -pix_fmt yuv444p -r 6
-c:v hevc_nvenc -preset lossless -tune lossless -tier high

-c:a copy -map 0 -c:v hevc_nvenc -preset p7 -tune hq 
-b:v 65M -minrate 45M -r 60 -tier high 
-temporal-aq 1 -i_qfactor 0.75 -b_qfactor 1.1 -refs:v 16 -rc-lookahead 32 
-bf 3 -b_ref_mode middle -format yuv420p 
-vf "scale=-2:1440:flags=bicubic"

-c:a aac -b:a 72k -c:v h264_nvenc -preset p7 -tune hq 
-b:v 2350k -minrate 1850k -pix_fmt yuv420p -filter_complex "
crop=408:720:436:0"
